# Architect Reference (Supplementary)

Authoritative rules are in `.github/agents/Architect.agent.md` and SSOT docs.

## ADR Skeleton

- Context
- Decision
- Alternatives considered
- Consequences (trade-offs)
- Rollout and rollback

## Decision Matrix (Compact)

- Option
- Benefits
- Risks
- Cost/complexity
- Operational impact

## Architecture Review Prompts

- Are boundaries and dependency directions explicit?
- Are failure modes and recovery paths defined?
- Are observability and testability first-class?
- Is migration incremental and reversible?
